speaker: Agent
message: Taulant, thank you for meeting with us. We're concerned about your illness following your journey to Drenas on the 28th. Can you start by telling us when you first noticed symptoms?

speaker: Taulant
message: It was late on the night of the 29th. At first, I thought it was just exhaustion I'd been overworking myself. But it hit me harder than I expected.

speaker: Agent
message: What kind of symptoms did you experience?

speaker: Taulant
message: Extreme headache, fever and muscle pain. It felt different from anything I've had before.

speaker: Agent
message: Did you come into close contact with anyone after your trip to Drenas?

speaker: Taulant
message: No, I didn't. I've mostly been keeping to myself. I didn't meet with family or friends after returning.

speaker: Agent
message: Let's go back to your journey. Can you recall who else was on the bus?

speaker: Comment
message: Shrugs

speaker: Taulant
message: Not really. I wasn't paying much attention. There was a woman old woman, I think sitting closer to the front.

speaker: Agent
message: Witnesses said you were wearing a lab coat during the trip. Is that typical for you?

speaker: Comment
message: shifts uncomfortably

speaker: Taulant
message: I guess I forgot to change before leaving the lab. It's not that unusual.

speaker: Agent
message: They also said you seemed distracted, like something was on your mind. What was bothering you?

speaker: Comment
message: shrugs it off

speaker: Taulant
message: Just research deadlines. You know how it is.

speaker: Agent
message: Can you tell us more about your work?

speaker: Taulant
message: I'm part of a project of cooperation between the Biology & Chemistry Faculty in Prishtina. We're focusing on experimental compounds.

speaker: Agent
message: What kind of compounds are you working on? Are they related to viruses or disease prevention?

speaker: Taulant
message: We're actually in an exciting phase we are researching to develop a vaccine using advanced AI. The system analyzed thousands of viral protein structures and genetic sequences to help us pinpoint the most effective formulation.

speaker: Agent
message: That sounds significant. Have your experiments shown anything unusual recently?

speaker: Taulant
message: Yes, our recent trials, both in cell cultures and animal models, have shown strong immune responses. The AI not only accelerated our research but also ensured the vaccine's stability and effectiveness. The lab records provide all the detailed results. You'd have to check the lab records if you're curious.

speaker: Agent
message: I see. And I noticed you took some time off recently do you often step away mid-project?

speaker: Taulant
message: I needed a break. I've been putting in long hours, and going back to my hometown Drenas felt like a good place to clear my head.

speaker: Agent
message: Thank you, Taulant. If we have more questions, we'll reach out. Please remain available.

speaker: Taulant
message: Absolutely, I'm here to provide any additional details you need.
